sourcesContent:
<ion-header [translucent]="true">
  <ion-toolbar>
    <ion-title>consultationliste</ion-title>
  </ion-toolbar>
</ion-header>

<ion-content [fullscreen]="true">
  <ion-header collapse="condense">
    <ion-toolbar>
      <ion-title size="large">consultationliste</ion-title>
    </ion-toolbar>
  </ion-header>
</ion-content>
<ion-content>
  <ion-list>
    <ion-item *ngFor="let consultation of consultations">
      <ion-label>{{ consultation.date }}</ion-label>
      <ion-button (click)="openConsultationModal(consultation)" color="primary">Modifier</ion-button>
    </ion-item>
  </ion-list>
</ion-content>
